state: You are now playing a fast paced episode of TextWorld! First of all, pick-up the American style key from the floor of the study. And then, go to the north. That done, make an effort to move east. And then, insert the American style key into the American style door within the sauna's lock to unlock it. After that, ensure that the American style door within the sauna is open. If you have pulled open the American style door, make an attempt to take a trip north. Then, move east. Then, make an attempt to travel north. Following that, attempt to venture east. Then, make an effort to head north. After that, try to move west. And then, make an attempt to travel west.
